patthana8.21:1.1_0: Nasaññojaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.21:1.1_1: Nasaññojaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.21:1.1_2: Nasaññojaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojaniyo ca naasaññojaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.21:2.1_0: Naasaññojaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.21:3.1_0: Nasaññojaniyañca naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.21:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
